toxic.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: containing poison, or caused by poisonous substances
toxic.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: fumes from a toxic waste dump
Toxic chemicals were spilled into the river.
toxic.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: very unpleasant and causing a lot of harm or unhappiness
toxic.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: You are clearly in a toxic relationship and you need to get out of it.
